name: Kugelblitz
description:
It has not been a good day for chief security officer Sofie Engel. Partly because the coffee machine is broken, and partly because the main reactor has gone critical and is about to create a black hole.

She has yet to decide which of the two is more aggravating.

With the clock ticking, Sofie must rescue the scientists and bring them to the escape ship before the singularity occurs.

And Dr. Protz just had to bring in his yappy pet, on today of all days...

Controls:
Move with the arrow keys, WASD, or the d-pad/analog stick.
Jump with X, Space, or any of the face buttons.
To insert a coin, press Enter/Start.

Kugelblitz was made in Godot 3.1 for the eighth Godot Wild Jam.
You can get the source code here.
The cover-art was made by Jodediah Holems.
